alert.note: Alert for Bates; Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:44PM CDT until May 09 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henry County in west central Missouri... Eastern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 644 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Butler to 6 miles west of Appleton City to near Schell City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Urich, Deepwater, Montrose, Coal, Rockville, Brownington, Tightwad, Ballard, Hartwell, La Due and Truman Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
